sn35.128:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn35.128:4.2: Atha kho soṇo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.128:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho soṇo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.128:4.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.128:4.6: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.128:4.8: Ayaṃ kho, soṇa, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantīti.
